title: Dadra and Nagar Haveli
summary: Dadra and Nagar Haveli  is a district of the union territory of Dadra and Nagar Haveli and Daman and Diu in northwestern India. It is composed of two separate geographical entities: Nagar Haveli, wedged in between Maharashtra and Gujarat states 1 kilometre (0.62Â mi) to the north-west, the smaller enclave of Dadra, which is surrounded by Gujarat. Silvassa is the administrative headquarters of Dadra and Nagar Haveli.
